question: Which statement accurately describes the trend in rainfall over the past 14 days, based on the chart?

options.A: The rainfall was highest at the beginning and decreased towards the end.
options.B: Rainfall was highest in the middle of the 14 days.
options.C: Rainfall was highest at the start and decreased towards the end of the 14 days.
options.D: Rainfall peaked at the end of the 14 days.

explanation: The x-axis has been manipulated to show a consistent decline due to the incorrect time sequence, but rainfall was actually highest at the middle.
